definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
a device for extracting water (such as a centrifuge)

sentences.english: Not enough cooling power could mean heatstroke or dehydration.
sentences.chinese: 冷却能力不足会造成中暑脱水。
高压喷淋及脱水腔室装置。

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脱水和发烧可用口服补液盐和对乙酰氨基酚进行治疗。

sentences.english: Glacial acetic acid is a dehydrating agent and an irritant and is corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 冰醋酸是个脱水代理及刺激物和腐蚀。

sentences.english: A new method for drying methomyl oxime based on the azeotropic principle is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍采用共沸脱水原理进行灭多威肟干燥的新方法。

sentences.english: The advantages of the continuous process versus the centrifuge opener are laid out.
sentences.chinese: 与离心脱水开幅机相比，叙述了这一连续工艺的优点。

sentences.english: It is an Importer and Exporter. Buy dried chili , Dried bean…
sentences.chinese: 美国公司求购干辣椒，干豆子，脱水大蒜。

sentences.english: Even a mild case of dehydration can reduce your mental energy and capacity, causing your memory to become impaired.
sentences.chinese: 轻度脱水也会降低思维能力，损伤记忆力。

sentences.english: Separate holding tanks can be installed to accumulate this slurry prior to dewatering.
sentences.chinese: 可以安装分开的接受器在脱水之前积累这泥浆。

sentences.english: Coexisting tetracycline and anhydrochlorotetracycline do not interfere with the determination of chlorotetracycline.
sentences.chinese: 共存四环素和脱水金霉素杂质不干扰金霉素测定。

sentences.english: Especially in the case of young tortoises, a more humid area should be provided to prevent dehydration.
sentences.chinese: 特别注意的是幼龟应给予比较潮湿的环境来防止脱水。

sentences.english: No dehydration or over-dehydration gave poor results.
sentences.chinese: 不脱水或过度脱水的效果均差。

sentences.english: No dehydration or over-dehydration gave poor results.
sentences.chinese: 不脱水或过度脱水的效果均差。

sentences.english: Let the washing spin before you put it out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 先让衣服在脱水机里转一转，再拿出去晾干。

sentences.english: When wet waste is dewatered, it leaves behind a dry biosolid.
sentences.chinese: 当湿废物脱水后，残留下了干生物废料。

sentences.english: Mainly used for sludge dewatering, solid-liquid separation and coal washing, etc.
sentences.chinese: 主要用于污泥脱水，固液分离和洗煤等。
